derivation: probably akin to G5530 (χρίω) through the idea of contact;
strongs_def: to smear or rub with oil, i.e. (by implication) to consecrate to an office or religious service
outline:
1. to anoint
    1. consecrating Jesus to the Messianic office, and furnishing him with the necessary powers for its administration
    2. enduing Christians with the gifts of the Holy Spirit
